0.7.0.en: Add support for Aqara B1 curtain controller & app store (Aqara branding) update

0.7.1.en: Fix issue Cube trigger flow card arguments not showing up

0.8.0.en: Add support for Aqara & Xiaomi EU plugs, Xiaomi light sensors and additional expert settings for several sensors

1.0.0.en: Initial SDK3 Homey app store release

1.0.1.en: Fix Aqara wireless single switch (2018) trigger and light sensor battery reporting

1.1.0.en: Add support water-, smoke- and gas-sensors, Aqara Opple switches, Aqara D1 switch series and fix light sensor

1.1.1.en: Add support water-, smoke- and gas-sensors, Aqara Opple switches, Aqara D1 switch series and fix light sensor

1.1.2.en: Add support water-, smoke- and gas-sensors, Aqara Opple switches, Aqara D1 switch series and fix light sensor

1.1.3.en: Add battery capabilities for remaining devices and add gas- and smoke-density capabilities for the detectors

1.1.4.en: Add battery capabilities for remaining devices and add gas- and smoke-density capabilities for the detectors

1.2.0.en: Add support for Aqara T1 switches

1.2.1.en: Add support for Aqara T1 switches

1.2.2.en: Add support for Aqara T1 switches

1.2.3.en: Update Aqara B1 curtain controller operation and settings, power measuring capabilities, settings on the T1 devices and fix door sensor inversed operation

1.2.4.en: Add filtering for temperature & humidity sensor, minor fixes

1.2.6.en: Fix battery reporting on Aqara Temperature and Humidity sensor

1.3.0.en: Add support for the Aqara Air Quality Monitor (AAQQS-S01)

1.3.1.en: Add support for Aqara H1 Wireless double switch & fix crashes Homey bridge

1.3.2.en: Add support for the Aqara H1 wireless double switch

1.3.3.en: Add support Aqara H1 wall switches (no neutral) & add additional devices to Homey Cloud

1.3.4.en: Add support Aqara H1 wall switches (no neutral) & add additional devices to Homey Cloud

1.3.5.en: Add support Aqara H1 wall switches (no neutral) & add additional devices to Homey Cloud

1.3.6.en: Fix Aqara D1 single and double switch (no neutral)

1.3.7.en: Fix Aqara D1 single and double switch (no neutral)

1.3.8.en: Fix Aqara D1 single and double switch (no neutral)

1.4.0.en: Add support Aqara H1 wall switches (with Neutral) and fix issue Aqara H1 wall switches (no Neutral)

1.4.1.en: Add support Aqara H1 wall switches (with Neutral) and fix issue Aqara H1 wall switches (no Neutral)

1.4.2.en: Fix H1 switch state issue and extend temperature range

1.5.0.en: Add support for Aqara Roller Shade Driver E1, battery reporting optimization and updated device naming

1.6.0.en: Add support for Motion Sensor P1 (MS-S02)
